title: What would you like someone to invent a robot to do? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d like someone to invent a robot that would be the woman of my dreams. So what if she’s mechanical? She’d fulfill my ideals of beauty, kindness, and romantic love, she’d enjoy the same kinds of activities I enjoy, and she’d never dump me, become unfriendly, or bring baggage into the relationship. Invent robots like those, and you’d be an instant billionaire.
